name: Fast Food Blender
description:
Simple Match-3 Android Game with story and fast food objects. I tried to make different levels, so they would be intresting. Game is pretty short, my goal wasnt be like "Make 3000+ levels match-3 game", more like "Learn basics of coding and finish your first project". And im kinda happy with it, its look finished.

This is my 1st ever full game.  Almost full :)

Made in Godot Engine, which I still love very much, but had to move on to Unity. I was working on this project about 3 months, tried to learn how to code and to draw things, it was pretty challenging. Followed by the guide of Mr Taft Creates first, but then decided to go my way. I implemended so many things in the code all by myself, i was so happy about it. It looks pretty finished game, no bugs and such.
